Package hotelmanagement

Class User

java.lang.Object
hotelmanagement.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Consists of creating users and adding them to a database. The characteristics of a user can then be modified or viewed.
See Also:
Serialized Form
